=== 2) CONTROLLER — Event/Opportunity ===
---- app/Http/Controllers/EventController.php
     1	<?php
       
     2	namespace App\Http\Controllers;
       
     3	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     4	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     5	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;
       
     6	class EventController extends Controller
     7	{
     8	    public function index(Request $request)
     9	    {
    10	        $q         = trim((string)$request->get('q', ''));
    11	        $category  = $request->get('category');
    12	        $region    = $request->get('region');
    13	        $dateFrom  = $request->get('date_from');
    14	        $dateTo    = $request->get('date_to');
    15	        $sort      = $request->get('sort', 'newest');
       
    16	        $table = 'events';
    17	        $has   = fn($col) => Schema::hasColumn($table, $col);
       
    18	        $builder = DB::table($table)->select("$table.*");
       
    19	        if ($q !== '') {
    20	            $builder->where(function ($w) use ($q, $table, $has) {
    21	                $w->when($has('title'), fn($x) => $x->orWhere("$table.title", 'LIKE', "%{$q}%"))
    22	                  ->when($has('description'), fn($x) => $x->orWhere("$table.description", 'LIKE', "%{$q}%"));
    23	            });
    24	        }
       
    25	        if (!empty($category) && $has('category')) {
    26	            $builder->where("$table.category", $category);
    27	        }
    28	        if (!empty($region) && $has('region')) {
    29	            $builder->where("$table.region", $region);
    30	        }
    31	        if (!empty($dateFrom) && $has('start_date')) {
    32	            $builder->whereDate("$table.start_date", '>=', $dateFrom);
    33	        }
    34	        if (!empty($dateTo) && $has('end_date')) {
    35	            $builder->whereDate("$table.end_date", '<=', $dateTo);
    36	        }
       
    37	        $closingExpr = DB::raw("COALESCE($table.deadline, $table.end_date, $table.start_date, $table.created_at)");
    38	        if ($sort === 'closing_soon') {
    39	            $builder->orderBy($closingExpr, 'asc');
    40	        } else {
    41	            $builder->orderBy("$table.created_at", 'desc');
    42	        }
       
    43	        $events = $builder->paginate(12)->appends($request->query());
    44	        return view('events.index', compact('events', 'q', 'category', 'region', 'dateFrom', 'dateTo', 'sort'));
    45	    }
       
    46	    public function show($idOrSlug)
    47	    {
    48	        $table = 'events';
    49	        $has = fn($col) => Schema::hasColumn($table, $col);
       
    50	        $query = DB::table($table)->select("$table.*");
    51	        if ($has('slug') && !is_numeric($idOrSlug)) {
    52	            $query->where("$table.slug", $idOrSlug);
    53	        } else {
    54	            $query->where("$table.id", (int)$idOrSlug);
    55	        }
       
    56	        $event = $query->first();
    57	        abort_if(!$event, 404);
       
    58	        return view('events.show', compact('event'));
    59	    }
    60	}
---- app/Http/Controllers/OpportunityController.php
     1	<?php
       
     2	namespace App\Http\Controllers;
       
     3	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     4	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     5	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;
     6	use Illuminate\Support\Str;
     7	use Carbon\Carbon;
       
     8	class OpportunityController extends Controller
     9	{
    10	    public function index(Request $request)
    11	    {
    12	        $q         = trim((string)$request->get('q', ''));
    13	        $category  = $request->get('category');
    14	        $region    = $request->get('region');
    15	        $dateFrom  = $request->get('date_from');
    16	        $dateTo    = $request->get('date_to');
    17	        $sort      = $request->get('sort', 'newest');
       
    18	        $table = 'opportunities';
    19	        $has   = fn($col) => Schema::hasColumn($table, $col);
       
    20	        $builder = DB::table($table);
       
    21	        // Basic select
    22	        $builder->select("$table.*");
       
    23	        // Searching
    24	        if ($q !== '') {
    25	            $builder->where(function ($w) use ($q, $table, $has) {
    26	                $w->when($has('title'), fn($x) => $x->orWhere("$table.title", 'LIKE', "%{$q}%"))
    27	                  ->when($has('description'), fn($x) => $x->orWhere("$table.description", 'LIKE', "%{$q}%"));
    28	            });
    29	        }
       
    30	        // Filters
    31	        if (!empty($category) && $has('category')) {
    32	            $builder->where("$table.category", $category);
    33	        }
    34	        if (!empty($region) && $has('region')) {
    35	            $builder->where("$table.region", $region);
    36	        }
    37	        if (!empty($dateFrom) && $has('start_date')) {
    38	            $builder->whereDate("$table.start_date", '>=', $dateFrom);
    39	        }
    40	        if (!empty($dateTo) && $has('end_date')) {
    41	            $builder->whereDate("$table.end_date", '<=', $dateTo);
    42	        }
       
    43	        // Sorting
    44	        $closingExpr = DB::raw("COALESCE($table.deadline, $table.end_date, $table.start_date, $table.created_at)");
    45	        if ($sort === 'closing_soon') {
    46	            $builder->orderBy($closingExpr, 'asc');
    47	        } else {
    48	            $builder->orderBy("$table.created_at", 'desc');
    49	        }
       
    50	        $opportunities = $builder->paginate(12)->appends($request->query());
    51	        return view('opportunities.index', compact('opportunities', 'q', 'category', 'region', 'dateFrom', 'dateTo', 'sort'));
    52	    }
       
    53	    public function show($idOrSlug)
    54	    {
    55	        $table = 'opportunities';
    56	        $has = fn($col) => Schema::hasColumn($table, $col);
       
    57	        $query = DB::table($table)->select("$table.*");
    58	        if ($has('slug') && !is_numeric($idOrSlug)) {
    59	            $query->where("$table.slug", $idOrSlug);
    60	        } else {
    61	            $query->where("$table.id", (int)$idOrSlug);
    62	        }
       
    63	        $opportunity = $query->first();
    64	        abort_if(!$opportunity, 404);
       
    65	        return view('opportunities.show', compact('opportunity'));
    66	    }
    67	}

---- app/Models/Event.php
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Models;
       
     3	use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Factories\HasFactory;
     4	use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model;
       
     5	class Event extends Model
     6	{
     7	    use HasFactory;
     8	    protected $fillable = [
     9	        'title','description','date','time','location_id','organization_id',
    10	        'category_id','volunteers_needed','image'
    11	    ];
    12	    protected $dates = ['date','time'];
    13	    public function location() { return $this->belongsTo(Location::class); }
    14	    public function organization() { return $this->belongsTo(Organization::class); }
    15	    public function category() { return $this->belongsTo(Category::class); }
    16	    public function volunteers() { return $this->belongsToMany(User::class)->withPivot('status')->withTimestamps(); }
    17	}

     2	use Illuminate\Database\Migrations\Migration;

     4	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;
       
     5	return new class extends Migration {

     8	        if (!Schema::hasTable('attendances')) {
     9	            Schema::create('attendances', function (Blueprint $t) {
    10	                $t->id();
    11	                $t->unsignedBigInteger('user_id')->index();
    12	                $t->unsignedBigInteger('opportunity_id')->index();

    20	            });
    21	        }

    24	            Schema::create('volunteer_hours', function (Blueprint $t) {
    25	                $t->id();
    26	                $t->unsignedBigInteger('user_id')->index();
    27	                $t->unsignedBigInteger('opportunity_id')->index();

    29	                $t->enum('source', ['attendance','manual'])->default('attendance');
    30	                $t->boolean('locked')->default(true)->index();
    31	                $t->timestamps();
    32	                $t->unique(['user_id','opportunity_id','source']);
    33	            });
    34	        }
       
    35	        // opportunities: status, completed_at, QR tokens
    36	        Schema::table('opportunities', function (Blueprint $t) {
    37	            if (!Schema::hasColumn('opportunities','status')) {
    38	                $t->string('status', 20)->default('open')->index();
    39	            }
    40	            if (!Schema::hasColumn('opportunities','completed_at')) {
    41	                $t->timestamp('completed_at')->nullable()->index();
    42	            }
    43	            if (!Schema::hasColumn('opportunities','checkin_token')) {
    44	                $t->string('checkin_token', 64)->nullable()->unique();
    45	            }
